title: Increasing policy rate shifts AD left in SR

content.prompt: In the short run, an increase in the policy rate will cause

choices.label: a rightward shift in the aggregate demand curve
a leftward shift in the aggregate demand curve
a rightward shift in the aggregate supply curve
a leftward shift in the aggregate supply curve
a movement along the aggregate demand curve

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
